The Eiffel Tower did not disappoint. Grab a beret and a baguette and look closer than the postcards. From far away, the tower seems light and decorative, but up close it feels strong and precise. The iron ‚Äúlace‚Äù is not decoration. It is the structure itself. Every curve and crisscross helps the tower stand tall against gravity and wind.
